articles.title: Ulster Fans Question Why La Rochelle Fans Were In The Aviva Stadium For Clash - Balls.ie
articles.description: Ulster fans were left unhappy as La Rochelle fans were in attendance at the Aviva Stadium in their 36-29 defeat to the European champions
articles.content:
In a week full of drama for Ulster fans, the drama continued at the Aviva Stadium in a 29-36 defeat to La Rochelle.
Their Champions Cup hopes were at risk after a heavy defeat away to Sale last week… [+3951 chars]
